hero.headline: Everything you need to ship
hero.subheadline: The MLOps platform for computer vision. Manage your data, train models, deploy them, and keep them running.
hero.heroImageAlt: Picsellia platform - Complete MLOps for computer vision

platformLifecycle.title: One platform. Zero friction.
platformLifecycle.description: One platform instead of five tools duct-taped together. Built for computer vision from day one.

data.headline: Stop drowning in unorganized data
data.problem: Your images are scattered across cloud buckets, hard drives, and legacy systems. Finding the right data for training takes days, not minutes.
data.solution: One source of truth for all your visual data. Connect any storage, auto-organize with AI, and find exactly what you need in seconds.

annotate.headline: Labeling shouldn't be your bottleneck
annotate.problem: Manual annotation is slow, expensive, and error-prone. Your ML team is wasting time on labeling instead of building models.
annotate.solution: AI-assisted labeling cuts annotation time by 10x. Built-in quality control ensures consistent, high-quality training data.

train.headline: Experiments shouldn't disappear
train.problem: You've run hundreds of experiments but can't reproduce your best results. Model versions are scattered across notebooks.
train.solution: Every experiment tracked, every model versioned, every result reproducible. Compare runs side-by-side.

deploy.headline: Production shouldn't be a black box
deploy.problem: Your model works in the lab but fails in production. You only find out when customers complain.
deploy.solution: Deploy with confidence. Real-time monitoring catches drift before it impacts users.

useCases.title: What people build with it
useCases.description: Manufacturing, agriculture, energy, logistics. Different industries, same workflow.

defectDetection.title: Defect Detection
defectDetection.description: Spot surface defects and assembly errors on the production line. Cameras check every part, every time.

cropMonitoring.title: Crop Monitoring
cropMonitoring.description: Fly a drone over your fields, feed the images to a model, and know which plots need attention before it is visible to the eye.

infrastructureInspection.title: Infrastructure Inspection
infrastructureInspection.description: Inspect pipelines, power lines, and solar panels from drone footage instead of sending people out.

assemblyVerification.title: Assembly Verification
assemblyVerification.description: Check that every component is in the right place, in real time, on the line.

wasteSorting.title: Waste Sorting
wasteSorting.description: Tell plastic from cardboard on a conveyor belt. Sorting facilities use this to automate what used to be manual.

integrations.title: Works with your stack
integrations.description: Plug into the tools you already use. Nothing proprietary, no lock-in.

ctaSection.title: Start detecting in minutes
ctaSection.description: Go from raw images to a model running in production. Free trial, no credit card, cancel anytime.
